laboratory_examinations.findings: A germline p53 gene mutation was detected in exon 10, codon 336, generating a stop codon (E336X). A further p53 mutation was found in exon 7 in the granulosa cell tumor.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Mutation occurred de novo since there was no history of tumors in any family members, all of whom had a wild-type p53.
